oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stamps Quartet - American Beauty Flour #17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Stamps Quartet radio program #17 sponsored by American Beauty Flour, with songs from their Select Radio Songs songbook. Featuring Roy George (announcer), and Frank Stamps (host, performer). This disc was originally broadcast by KWHI, Brenham, Texas, possibly also recorded at this station (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stamps Quartet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Beauty Flour jingle -- Opening statement (Roy George) -- Opening statement (Frank Stamps) -- I Thank My Savior For It All -- American Beauty Flour commercial -- Frank Stamps talks -- Echoes From The Glory Shore -- Frank Stamps talks -- I Love The Lord -- Frank Stamps talks -- Give Me Your Hand -- Closing statements -- American Beauty Flour jingle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KWHI (Radio station : Benham, Tex.); Stamps Quartet; Stamps, Frank H., 1896-1965
